Server.Name: House Flipper: Apocalypse Edition
Server.Description:
House Flipper: Apocalypse Edition - A building-focused modpack for 7 Days to Die
Features Include: - CP Modded Ecosystem: Thousands of new items, blocks, and content additions - No Horde Nights: Pre-configured to eliminate bloodmoon pressure and let you focus on building - Biome Progression Disabled: Consistent difficulty across all regions - Building Focus: LittleRedSonja decorative and functional building pieces - Quality of Life: Modern UI improvements (CATUI, Quartz) and navigation aids (Minimap) - Vehicle Support: Bobcat Vehicle mod for material transportation - Multiplayer Ready: Works on servers and co-op play - One-Step Installation: Download and play with the mod launcher
Perfect for players who want to experience the apocalypse without the constant threat of horde nights!
Server.ReleaseNotes: Initial Release v1.0.0 - CP Modded Core V2 foundation - CP Modded AIO No Traders (pre-configured for reduced hordes) - CP Compat Patch and Traders - Quality of Life mods (CATUI, Quartz, SPuppyMiniMap) - Building mods (LittleRedSonja, BobcatVehicle) - Comprehensive documentation and setup guides - Git LFS support for large mod files
